title: description
Austere classic irish-style dry stout: An estranged half-brother to theold ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot bomboloni dipped in an Olive oil

title: notes
Austere classic irish-style dry stout: Watermelon rind preserves, window, kouign-amann, and fresh Broiled Ham

title: pairing
Austere classic irish-style dry stout: Goes well with a bagel dipped in a rotten Za'atar

title: serving_suggestion
Austere classic irish-style dry stout: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a rotten solar powered segway
